00015         VideoManager::VideoManager()
00016         {
00017             SDL_InitSubSystem(SDL_INIT_VIDEO);
00018             flags = SDL_DOUBLEBUF | SDL_HWSURFACE | SDL_HWACCEL | SDL_OPENGL;
00019         }
00020 
00021         VideoManager::~VideoManager()
00022         {
00023             SDL_QuitSubSystem(SDL_INIT_VIDEO);
00024         }

00027         {
00028             static VideoManager instance;
00029             return &instance;

00032         void VideoManager::setVideoMode(std::string title)
00033         {
00034             SDL_Rect **modes = SDL_ListModes(NULL, flags | SDL_FULLSCREEN);
00035 
00036             /* Auto-select video mode. */
00037             size = Vector2D(800, 600);
00038             if(modes!=NULL) {
00039                 size = Vector2D(modes[0]->w, modes[0]->h);
00040             }
00041                         
00042             SDL_SetVideoMode((int) size.getX(), (int) size.getY(), 0,
00043                     flags | SDL_FULLSCREEN);
00044             SDL_ShowCursor(0);
00045             SDL_WM_SetCaption(title.c_str(), NULL);
00046 
00047             setVideoDefaults();
00048         }
00049 
00050         void VideoManager::setVideoMode(const Vector2D &size,
00051                                         std::string title)
00052         {
00053             SDL_WM_SetCaption(title.c_str(), NULL);
00054             setVideoMode(size);
00055         }
00056 
00057         void VideoManager::setVideoMode(const Vector2D &size)
00058         {
00059             this->size = Vector2D((float)(int) size.getX(),
00060                     (float)(int) size.getY());
00061 
00062             SDL_SetVideoMode((int) size.getX(), (int) size.getY(), 0, flags);
00063             SDL_ShowCursor(0);
00064             
00065             setVideoDefaults();
00066         }
00067 
00068         void VideoManager::setVideoDefaults()
00069         {
00070             glViewport(0, 0, (GLsizei) size.getX(), (GLsizei) size.getY());
00071 
00072             glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00073             glLoadIdentity();
00074             glOrtho(0.0f, (GLfloat) size.getX(), (GLfloat) size.getY(), 
00075                     0.0f, -1.0f, 1.0f);
00076 
00077             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00078             glLoadIdentity();
00079 
00080             glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00081             glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00082 
00083             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00084             glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00085 
00086             glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00087             glHint(GL_LINE_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00088 
00089             setClearColor(Color(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
00090             setColor(Color(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f));
00091 
00092             glLineWidth(1.5f);
00093         }
00094 
00095         const Vector2D &VideoManager::getSize() const
00096         {
00097             return size;
00098         }

00140         void VideoManager::transform(const AffineTransformationMatrix &matrix)
00141                 const
00142         {
00143             float *glMatrix = new float[16];
00144 
00145             /* Our AffineTransformationMatrix
00146              *     / a b c \
00147              *     | d e f |
00148              *     \ 0 0 1 /
00149              * becomes a matrix we can use with OpenGL:
00150              *     / a b 0 c \
00151              *     | d e 0 f |
00152              *     | 0 0 1 0 |
00153              *     \ 0 0 0 1 /
00154              */
00155 
00156             /* Intialize to 0. */
00157             for(int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00158                 glMatrix[i] = 0.0f;
00159             
00160             for(int row = 0; row < matrix.getHeight(); row++) {
00161                 for(int column = 0; column < matrix.getWidth(); column++) {
00162                     if(column < 2 && row < 2) {
00163                         glMatrix[column * 4 + row] =
00164                                 matrix.getValue(row, column);
00165                     }
00166                 }
00167             }
00168 
00169             glMatrix[2 * 4 + 2] = 1.0f;
00170             glMatrix[3 * 4 + 3] = 1.0f;
00171 
00172             glMatrix[3 * 4 + 0] = matrix.getValue(0, 2);
00173             glMatrix[3 * 4 + 1] = matrix.getValue(1, 2);
00174 
00175             glMultMatrixf(glMatrix);
00176             delete[] glMatrix;
00177         }
00178 
00179         void VideoManager::setColor(const Color &color)
00180         {
00181             this->color = color;
00182             glColor4f(color.getRed(), color.getGreen(),
00183                       color.getBlue(), color.getAlpha());
00184         }

00187         {
00188             return color;
00189         }

00191         void VideoManager::setClearColor(const Color &clearColor)
00192         {
00193             this->clearColor = clearColor;
00194             glClearColor(clearColor.getRed(), clearColor.getGreen(),
00195                          clearColor.getBlue(), clearColor.getAlpha());
00196         }
00197 
00198         const Color &VideoManager::getClearColor() const
00199         {
00200             return clearColor;
00201         }
00202 
00203         void VideoManager::invert()
00204         {
00205             Color tmp = color;
00206             setColor(clearColor);
00207             setClearColor(tmp);
00208         }
00209     };
00210 };
